Color Order Selector

Copyright 2017-2019 The MathWorks Inc.

Create the widget

f = figure(...
'Toolbar','none',...
'MenuBar','none',...
'NumberTitle','off',...
'Units','pixels',...
'Position',[100 100 320 320]);
movegui(f,[100 -100])
w = uiw.widget.ColorOrderSelector(...
'Parent',f,...
'ColorOrder',[0 1 1; 1 0 0; 0 1 0],...
'Callback',@(h,e)disp(e),...
'Label','Select a color order:',...
'LabelLocation','top',...
'LabelHeight',18,...
'Units','pixels',...
'Position', [10 10 300 300]);
